channel.title: How to make a PVP shop-- help-- thanks
channel.description:
Hey guys, i need help creating a PVP shop, where you can only got the items in it, if you have the required pk points in it. and we have a client for our server.
Can Anyone Help me?
Sincerly, W3rf4c3

item.title: How to make a PVP shop-- help-- thanks
item.dc:creator: @mad_moparscapian mad_moparscapian
item.description:
@mad_moparscapian wrote:

There is already one of these in reapagescape. But i dunno how they did it… I’ll try find out for you…

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a PVP shop-- help-- thanks
